main.name: Jason
main.occupation: up-and-coming software developer looking to make a splash in the industry
main.bio: Currently, I'm a second-year Computing Science student at SFU. I'll be on the hunt for my first software developing internship this summer. I consider myself to be very passionate about code and can't wait to work with like-minded people. I've worked with a varitey of technologies such as ReactJS, Maven, Spring Boot, Git, ElasticBeanstalk, CloudFront, mySQL and Postman. I'm familiar with languages such as Java, JavaScript, C, C++, Python, Html, Css

resume.skillmessage: I'm familiar with a wide variety of technologies

education.description: I have taken several introductory CS-related courses as well as a course in data structures & algorithms

work.title: Full Stack
work.description: Bijou Budget is an intuitive budget tracking application made using react, spring boot and mySQL. It helps users keep track of their monthly spending and view relevant financial data.

work.title: Backend (Java)
work.description: This weather app sends concise daily weather information to my phone during exams seasons. It also provides me with the time it takes to get from my home to SFU. I used a weather and a traffic api to support this project.
